title: Liabilities and Offenses Connected with Telephones,
context: CHAPTER 275 LIABILITIES AND OFFENSES CONNECTED WITH TELEPHONES, WIRE COMMUNICATIONS, AND CABLE TELEVISION SYSTEMS Section 275-1 to 5 Repealed 275-6 Party line; refusal to yield in emergency 275-7 Definitions 275-8, 9 Repealed Note Chapter heading amended by L 1977, c 157, §1.
